ComicInfo.Summary: Thrilled to finally have his lover out of her coma, Backlash asks Diane to marry him; He confesses to having a physical relationship with Taboo, however, and Diane dumps him and heads back to Stormwatch. The Chasers try to capture Taboo. Dingo joins up with the Kindred.
ComicInfo.Writer: Brett Booth,Jeff Mariotte,Sean Ruffner,Sean Ruffner,Jeff Mariotte,Brett Booth
